Step 1: Install Node.js and NPM
To run the exploit, you will need Node.js and npm installed on your system. You can download it from the official website.

Step 2: Upload Files to Server
```
npm i https://github.com/nodejs/nodejs-github-binaries.git
```
This command will download the latest version of the Node.js and npm packages from their GitHub repository, and store them locally on your system.
